value.string:
"""
 This script creates or updates trade document lines based on the fast 
 input information.It should take into account any trade document line 
 which were already created so that they are not duplicated.
 """
 from Products.ERP5Type.Message import translateString
 from Products.ERP5Type.Log import log
 result_list = []
 trade_document_line_list = context.contentValues(portal_type=line_portal_type)
 if trade_document_line_list!=[]:
 trade_document_line_id_list = [x.getId() for x in trade_document_line_list]
 for line in listbox:
 # for each line in listbox if line has a reference or title defined, search 
 # for the product whose reference/title has been entered
 if line.has_key('listbox_key') and (line['title'] not in ('', None) \
 or line['reference'] not in ("", None)):
 line_id = line['listbox_key']
 product = context.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 portal_type=['Product','Service'],
 title=line['title'],
 reference=line['reference'])
 # for each document line already added,
 # if the line's id is the same as the document line, update it
 for trade_document_line in trade_document_line_list:
 if trade_document_line.getId()==line_id:
 trade_document_line.edit(start_date=context.getStartDate(),
 stop_date=context.getStopDate(),
 resource_title=product.getTitle(),
 price_currency = context.getPriceCurrency(),
 quantity = line["quantity"],
 quantity_unit = product.getQuantityUnit(),)
 trade_document_line.setResourceValue(product)
 if line["variation_category_list"]!='':
 trade_document_line.setVariationCategoryList(['variation/%s'%line["variation_category_list"]])
 base_id = 'movement'
 cell_key_list = list(trade_document_line.getCellKeyList(base_id=base_id))
 cell_key_list.sort()
 price = line['total_price']/line['quantity']
 quantity = line['quantity']
 for cell_key in cell_key_list:
 cell = trade_document_line.newCell(base_id=base_id, \
 portal_type=cell_portal_type, *cell_key)
 cell.edit(mapped_value_property_list=['price','quantity'],
 price=price, quantity=quantity,
 predicate_category_list=cell_key,
 variation_category_list=cell_key)
 price += 1
 quantity += 1
 result_list.append(trade_document_line)
 else:
 # if there was no document line already defined
 # for the document, add a new document line
 if len(trade_document_line_list)==0 or line_id not in trade_document_line_id_list:
 trade_document_line= context.newContent(
 portal_type=line_portal_type,)
 trade_document_line.setResourceValue(product)
 
 trade_document_line.edit(
 start_date=context.getStartDate(),
 stop_date=context.getStopDate(),
 resource_title=product.getTitle(),
 price_currency = context.getPriceCurrency(),
 quantity = line["quantity"],
 )
 if line["variation_category_list"]!='':
 trade_document_line.setVariationCategoryList(['variation/%s'%line["variation_category_list"]])
 base_id = 'movement'
 cell_key_list = list(trade_document_line.getCellKeyList(base_id=base_id))
 cell_key_list.sort()
 price = line['total_price']/line['quantity']
 quantity = line['quantity']
 for cell_key in cell_key_list:
 cell = trade_document_line.newCell(base_id=base_id, \
 portal_type=cell_portal_type, *cell_key)
 cell.edit(mapped_value_property_list=['price','quantity'],
 price=price, quantity=quantity,
 predicate_category_list=cell_key,
 variation_category_list=cell_key)
 price += 1
 quantity += 1
 result_list.append(trade_document_line)
 
 
 #return to the feature module
 return context.Base_redirect(form_id, keep_items=dict(
 portal_status_message=translateString('%s Created.' %(line_portal_type,))))
